QuestData.Title: The Future of Gnomeregan
QuestData.Description: It's a victory for us every time we're able to help another survivor escape from the contaminated halls of Gnomeregan. $Cs like you will play an important part in the future of Gnomeregan. To that end, our leader, High Tinker Mekkatorque, has assembled a team of trainers to help you learn your arts.$B$BDrill Sergeant Steamcrank will help oversee your training and adjustment to life on the surface. He's waiting for you on the small practice field across the road.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Drill Sergeant Steamcrank in New Tinkertown.
QuestData.RewardText: For a gnome who has spent so much time inside Gnomeregan, you look positively fit and healthy, $n. That's good. Before we can complete what Operation: Gnomeregan began, we're going to need more warriors like you.
